data.title: Arthur J. Gallagher buys Germany's Krose GmbH
data.description:
• Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) has acquired Germany-based Krose GmbH & Co KG.
  • Terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Founded in 1920, Krose provides commercial insurance and reinsurance solutions for corporate clients across Germany and specializes in the design and placement of complex programs.
  • Source: Press Release

data.title: NCR Voyix beats top-line and bottom-line estimates; introduces FY26 outlook
data.description:
• NCR Voyix press release (VYX): Q4 Non-GAAP EPS of $0.31 beats by $0.02.
  • Revenue of $720M (+6.2% Y/Y) beats by $29.48M.
  • Adjusted EBITDA was $130 million compared to $111 million in the prior year period.
  • Software & Services Revenue was $504 million compared to $517 million in the prior year period.
  • ARR was $1.7 billion compared to $1.6 billion in the prior year period.
  • Software ARR was $783 million compared to $765 million in the prior year period.

  • 2026 Outlook

    For the full-year 2026, the Company is providing the following outlook:

data.title: Butterfly Network Non-GAAP EPS of -$0.02, revenue of $31.5M
data.description:
• Butterfly Network press release (BFLY): Q4 Non-GAAP EPS of -$0.02.
  • Revenue of $31.5M (+40.6% Y/Y).

  • Revenue Guidance and Adjusted EBITDA guidance for the Fiscal Year 2026:

    • Revenue of $117 million to $121 million ($110.6M), or approximately 20% to 24% growth
    • Adjusted EBITDA loss of $21 million to $25 million

data.title: American Bitcoin reports FY results
data.description:
• American Bitcoin press release (ABTC): FY net loss of $153.17M.
  • Revenue of $185.16M (+158.8% Y/Y) beats by $18.55M.

data.title: Cenovus Energy to redeem all outstanding Series 1 & 2 preferred shares
data.description:
• Cenovus Energy (CVE) said it will redeem all of its 2.577% Series 1 and 3.948% Series 2 preferred shares on March 31, 2026.
  • The shares will be redeemed at $25 per share, for a total payout of about $300M, funded mainly from cash on hand.
  • As previously announced, the company declared final quarterly dividends of $0.16106 per Series 1 share and $0.24337 per Series 2 share, payable on March 31, 2026, to shareholders of record as of March 13. These will be the last dividends on those preferred shares.

data.title: Clear Channel Outdoor reports Q4 results
data.description:
• Clear Channel Outdoor press release (CCO): Q4 AFFO of $59.8M, up 62.4%
  • Adjusted EBITDA $164M, up 13.6%
  • Revenue of $461.5M (+8.2% Y/Y) beats by $12.43M.

data.title: Palvella Therapeutics stock rises on $200M share offering
data.description:
• Palvella Therapeutics (PVLA) said it priced an upsized public offering of 1.6M shares at $125 per share.
  • The company expects to raise about $200M before fees and expenses. Underwriters have a 30-day option to buy up to 240,000 additional shares at the same price.
  • The offering is expected to close around February 27, 2026, pending customary conditions.
  • Palvella (PVLA) intends to use the net proceeds from this offering to support the development of its programs, including QTORIN rapamycin and QTORIN pitavastatin, and for working capital and other general corporate purposes, including research and development expenses.
  • PVLA shares rose 5% premarket at $135.05.

data.title: BeiGene Non-GAAP EPS of $1.95 beats by $0.65, revenue of $1.5B beats by $50M
data.description:
• BeiGene press release (ONC): Q4 Non-GAAP EPS of $1.95 beats by $0.65.
  • Revenue of $1.5B (+36.4% Y/Y) beats by $50M.

data.title: ACI Worldwide GAAP EPS of $0.62 misses by $0.18, revenue of $1.76B beats by $1.29B
data.description:
• ACI Worldwide press release (ACIW): Q4 GAAP EPS of $0.62 misses by $0.18.
  • Revenue of $1.76B (+288.5% Y/Y) beats by $1.29B.
  • "For the full year of 2026, we expect revenue growth to be in the 7% to 9% range on a constant currency basis, or in the range of $1.88 billion to $1.91 billion. We expect adjusted EBITDA to be in the range of $530 million to $550 million. For Q1 2026, we expect revenue to be between $405 million and $415 million and adjusted EBITDA of $88 million to $93 million." the company said.
